channel.title: Portal Gun Mod
channel.description:
I'm looking to do something along the lines of the [url='https://www.rogerdavies.com/2009/08/how-to-hack-half-life-2-to-play-with-the-portal-gun/']portal gun hack for hl2[/url]
Only thing is I don't know what .cfgs to the portal folder. What are the .cfg's for black mesa source anyways?

item.title: Portal Gun Mod
item.dc:creator: csquared
item.description:
oh sorry, ill remove it asap

Read full topic

item.title: Portal Gun Mod
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Well there’s not much more than that. Files should be in your Steamapps\sourcemods\BMS folder. Wrong section by the way, this is for submitting content you made for BMS.

Read full topic

item.title: Portal Gun Mod
item.dc:creator: csquared
item.description:
poker face i knew that and uh, where might i find such files?

Read full topic

item.title: Portal Gun Mod
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
You wouldn’t need the .cfgs, you’d just have to copy over the models/sounds/materials folders from Black Mesa to your portal/portal directory, however seeing as Portal doesn’t have the Black Mesa weapons, NOC’s, and all that good stuff coded like it does HL2’s it probably wouldn’t work too well.

Read full topic
